content: fptc 3 yarn over and draw loop back 1 working into a under post row of double crochet yarn over twice 4 yarn over and draw through 2 loops on hook 2 insert hook twice yarn over and behind the post of draw through the next double_crochet from remaining 2 loops on right to left hook as you would a normal double_crochet bptc the back post triple crochet is worked in a very similar manner to the front post triple crochet in step 2 instead of inserting the hook behind the post take the hook to the back of your work and insert from left to right in front of the stitch and out to the back of your work again yarn over and pull back through and complete stitch as usual
